summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers," likely referring to unauthorized web scraping activities. It directs entities to respect robots.txt rules, potentially indicating a focus on responsible data collection and website access. The bill mentions IP rate limiting as a consequence of misbehavior, suggesting measures to control and monitor scraping practices. It also recommends using the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service as an alternative data source, promoting the responsible use of government data and websites.
